author: cbs8
title: Global Automotive Ignition System Market 2015-2019
text:
Reportlinker
NEW YORK About Automotive Ignition Systems
Automotive ignition systems provide power to starting mechanisms, and mechanical and electrical components in automobiles. With the increase in prices of gasoline and growing environmental concerns globally, the automotive industry is investing in R&D to develop technologically advanced and improved ignition systems to ensure fuel efficiency and reduce emissions.
Technavio's analysts forecast the global automotive ignition system market to grow at a CAGR of 5.89% over the period 2014-2019.
Covered in this Report
The global automotive ignition system market can be segmented based on components into: ignition switches, spark plugs (gasoline engines), glow plugs (diesel engines), ignition coils, ignition control modules, crankshaft sensors, and camshaft position sensors.
Technavio's report, Global Automotive Ignition System Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers APAC, the Americas, and EMEA; it also covers the global automotive ignition system market landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
